Text:
it would be nice if people seeded this instead of just leeching,it might not be a new film but some people might still want to see this at a later date.

i hope iam not wasting my time
,oh yeah thank is always welcome....i do this 4 the love of it ..GOOD KARMA 2 U
i give up seeded over 30 peeps pure leechers ,what a waste of time ,if only people thought of others ....

wow, a lot of your ups are not even 4 weeks old.  your frustration is understandable but remember this is a public not private site.  there are bound to be more leechers than seeders present.  a simple suggestion would be rather than give up on your own uploads, why dont you try seeding intermittently so at least new people who havent had a chance to even see your ups can have a go, instead of 20 plus people at 89pct like kwangtung and house of traps for example.

NdluvTPB : i hear u, just a load of crap thinking people with no thought 4 others.

thanx 2 the ones who have seeded .i have over 2000 kung fu movies ,i was trying 2 release but  public or not the attitude is terrible on this site.

why should i seed again n again not gonna happen
